ActionTitle: Get Started with the Docusign API Today
ActionText: With a developer account you can test our APIs for free! Developer accounts do not expire and have Enterprise-level features enabled.
InfoText:
Possible signing return events

When a signer returns from an embedded signing experience, your application receives one of the following events in the query string:

signing_complete
The recipient has signed the document! The document will be securely stored on the Docusign, Inc. servers.

cancel
The recipient decides to finish later. The recipient clicked 'Finish Later' instead of 'Decline to Sign'

decline
The recipient declined to sign the document. This has VOIDED the document.

exception
An exception has occurred on the server during the signing session. Please check the parameters passed to the web service methods.

fax_pending
Recipient has a fax pending.

session_timeout
The recipient did not sign the document in time. The timeout is set to 20 minutes.

ttl_expired
The token was not used within the timeout period or the token was already accessed.

viewing_complete
The recipient did not need to sign but has completed the viewing ceremony.

Learn more about Embedded Signing
NextSignerLink: Click to go to the next Signer
CompletedText: Your application has been completed and is pending review. We will be in touch soon!

signing_focused_view_complete.Title: Signing Complete using Focused View!
signing_focused_view_complete.SubText: You have signed the document! The document will be securely stored on the Docusign, Inc. servers.

signing_complete.Title: Signing Complete!
signing_complete.SubText: You have signed the document! The document will be securely stored on the Docusign, Inc. servers.

cancel.Title: Return Event: cancel
cancel.SubText: You have canceled out of the signing experience. You clicked 'Finish Later' instead of 'Decline to Sign'

decline.Title: Return Event: decline
decline.SubText: You have declined to sign the document. This has VOIDED the document.

exception.Title: Return Event: exception
exception.SubText: An exception has occurred on the server. Please check the parameters passed to the Web Service Methods.

session_timeout.Title: Return Event: session_timeout
session_timeout.SubText: You did not sign the document in time. The timeout is set to 20 minutes.

ttl_expired.Title: Return Event: ttl_expired
ttl_expired.SubText: Trusted connection has expired. Server communication may be a problem.

viewing_complete.Title: Return Event: viewing_complete
viewing_complete.SubText: You have viewed the document without signing it.
